content: You seeing what those Mancs are saying for Sunday, lad?
Reckon they’re gonna take over the city center like they own the place.
Always the same with them. Pure wool behavior, honestly.
I’ve been thinking we meet 'em halfway, down by the station.
Just to let 'em know they’re in the wrong city.
Go on, what's the plan then?
How many of the lids are actually showing up?
Need to make sure we’ve got a proper crowd so they don't get brave.
Tons of us, lid. Don't even worry.
There’s a group on Signal organisin' the meet-up at 11.
We’re all heading down to the concourse to wait for the trains.
You don't even have to be front and center if you don't want.
Just having the numbers there is enough to send 'em back to the M62.
Nice. Can I bring my cousin? He’s been dying to get involved.
Defo, bring whoever. Strength in numbers, isn't it?
We’ll show 'em what this city is actually about.
Boss. Better than just fuming about it on the sofa, eh?
